events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering department focused on backend developer roles.
A recruiter from our engineering talent acquisition team has been assigned to your case and will be in contact shortly.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your technical experience, and you demonstrated a strong understanding of software development principles.
You responded promptly with detailed answers explaining your experience with devops tooling and backend services.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC with our senior engineering team.
You completed the technical interview successfully, showcasing strong problem-solving skills and deep knowledge in software architecture.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 13th at 11 AM UTC to discuss cultural fit and salary expectations.
You finished the HR interview with positive feedback from the team regarding your alignment with company values.
We have put together an offer reflecting your experience and skills as a backend engineer, and it has been proposed for your consideration.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We appreciate your enthusiasm to join the engineering team.
You have accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as a new member of our engineering department.
Your onboarding process has officially begun. We are providing all necessary resources to get you up to speed with our engineering projects.
The hiring process is now complete. You are now officially part of the engineering team, and we look forward to your contributions.
